function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Factory shutdowns impacting automobile production","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Massive impact on aviation industry due to travel bans","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in demand for new aircraft purchases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 causing a decline in international visitor arrivals and tourism receipts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic decline in global oil demand due to shutdown of international and domestic passenger aircraft","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Severe disruptions and delays in construction projects due to workforce unable to work as a result of stringent self-quarantine guidelines.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on construction sector leading to a drop in fixed asset investment and real estate development.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on the food industry, including closure of restaurants, cafes, and luxury food service providers, and difficulty meeting rising demands due to panic buying.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of ventilators, icus, and ppe in hospitals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive increase in network bandwidth consumption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Massive drop in share prices of telecommunications companies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient number of testing kits leading to infeasibility of large-scale covid-19 testing.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to distinguish covid-19 symptoms from common flu, leading to challenges in determining testing criteria.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Absence of large scale testing for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to accurate covid-19 tests","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False negative results in naat testing due to targeting a single gene","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability of serological tests to detect early-stage infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguity in diagnosing past infections with naat and serological tests","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No definitive treatment or preventive vaccine for the coronavirus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Treatment of covid-19 is mostly symptomatic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Patients with mild covid-19 symptoms managed at home","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus mutation challenges vaccine development","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long timeline for commercial release of vaccines","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential failure of vaccine efficacy in later clinical trials","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate public trust in traditional vaccine development methods","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global collaboration and resource allocation challenges","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cytokine bursts caused by vaccine leading to acute respiratory distress syndrome ards","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for multiple doses of covid-19 vaccine","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of unapproved drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive evidence for the effectiveness of shl oral liquid against covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in the development of a commercially viable vaccine for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of preventive measures recommended by who and cdc","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with hand hygiene, social distancing, and other preventative measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to disinfect frequently touched surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate use and disposal of masks","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to lack of effective public health response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential security and privacy risks in the use of digital technologies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of iot tools may lead to privacy concerns due to data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on iot tools for disease monitoring may lead to false alarms or missed cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorrect interpretation of iot data may lead to misinformed decision-making","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid surge in traffic on iomt tech and telemedicine platforms due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of regulations for telehealth services","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of telemedicine platforms for screening covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimal human contact treatment using telemedicine strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of telemedicine with other technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drone technology for crowd surveillance leading to privacy concerns and potential civil rights violations.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimized human interaction during the use of drones may lead to reduced community engagement and trust.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cybersecurity measures for drone technology could lead to data breaches and misuse of surveillance data.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for surveillance and crowd monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
